name: Real Checkers
description:
This app brings classic checkers (draughts) game into new dimension. With advanced 3D graphics you can feel all beauty of interacting with virtual board and pieces. Choose to play with AI or with real opponents.

Game Features:

* Includes еnglish draughts and russian shashki game variants.
* Advanced 3D graphics;
* Online gameplay.
* Chat with opponents while playing online;
* Different themes of checkers set;
* 3D and 2D board variants;
* Both landscape and portrait screen mode supported.

Location data may be used for providing you more relevant ads
